flexflux.analyses

Class PP3DAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • flexflux.analyses.Analysis
      • flexflux.analyses.PP3DAnalysis

  • public class PP3DAnalysis
extends Analysis
    Class to run an analysis with two varying fluxes.
    Author:
    lmarmiesse 18 avr. 2013
